RecipientBusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: UNITED WAY OF CENTRAL AND NE CT

ReasonableCauseExplanation.ExplanationTxt: THIS 990PF IS BEING FILED LATE AS A RESULT OF EXTENUATING PERSONAL CIRCUMSTANCES WITH THE PAID PROVIDER. BECAUSE THE PAID PROVIDER IS SELF-EMPLOYED, THERE WAS NOT ANOTHER CPA AVAILABLE TO FINALIZE AND SUBMIT THE RETURN ON THE OFFICER'S BEHALF. THE SORENSON-PEARSON FOUNDATION HAS A HISTORY OF FILING THEIR 990-PF ON A TIMELY BASIS. THIS CURRENT YEAR, THE SORENSON-PEARSON FOUNDATION WAS OVERPAID. THEREFORE, THE GOVERNMENT WAS NOT DUE TAXES WITH THE LATE-FILED RETURN.
